code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import translationEN from"../i18n/en.json";import translationUK from"../i18n/uk.json";i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{en:{translation:translationEN},uk:{translation:translationUK}},fallbackLng:"uk",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
